pkgmetadata.longdescription: # dav_toolsPersonal Python library to aid in software development## Installation```bash$ pip install dav-tools```## Usage`dav-tools` contains a variety of diffent submodules, each with its own set of functionalities.Importing is done in the form of```pythonfrom dav_tools import <submodule>```since it usually doesn't make sense to import the whole library.
